description: This file defines a Flutter screen widget that displays a list of budgets, fetched from a provider, with progress indicators for each budget category.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: A Flutter widget representing the screen that displays the list of budgets.

classes.name: _BudgetsScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the build and data fetching for BudgetsScreen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the widget state and triggers budget fetching asynchronously.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the budgets screen, including a loading indicator or a list of budget progress bars.
